00037 #define MAXL 200

00039 enum e_footprint {
00040     PART_SHAPE_UNKNOWN = 0, /* drawn as circle with line*/
00041     PART_SHAPE_RECTANGLE = 1, /* rectangle with one side marked*/
00042     PART_SHAPE_STD = 2 /* rectangle with one corner marked*/
00043 };
00044 
00071 typedef struct pnp_state {
00072     
00073     char     designator[MAXL];
00074     char     footprint[MAXL];
00075     double   mid_x;
00076     double   mid_y;
00077     double   ref_x;
00078     double   ref_y;
00079     double   pad_x;
00080     double   pad_y;
00081     char     layer[MAXL]; /*T is top B is bottom*/
00082     double   rotation;
00083     char     comment[MAXL];    
00084     int      shape;
00085     double   width;
00086     double   length;
00087 
00088     unsigned int nuf_push;  /* Nuf pushes to estimate stack size */
00089     struct pnp_state *next;
00090     } pnp_state_t;
00091
